TO ANYONE WHO TRIED EVERYTHING BUT STILL COULDNT GET IT TO WORK (UPDATE CRACK, CHANGE TIMEZONE AND DATE TO 13TH 14TH ETC....) YOU GOTTA UPDATE YOUR WINDOWS. I BELIEVE MOST OF US ARE USING PRIVATED WINDOWS 7 SO ITS NOT GONNA AUTOMATICLY UPDATE ITSELF. IN THAT CASE, YOU GO TO "START" BUTTON, CLICK ON SEARCH AND TYPE "UPDATE", THEN CLICK ON "WINDOWS UPDATE" AND LET IT DO ITS JOB, AFTER THAT, LET YOUR COMPUTER DO A REBOOT. BEFORE YOU TRY TO RUN THE GAME, YOU MIGHT WANT TO CHANGE THE DATE BACK TO THE 14TH AND TIMEZONE +8:00 (JUST IN CASE)...NOW YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO PLAY THE GAME. ENJOY :D

Ok this crack worked for me, no you don't need to change the date with this crack (I didn't).  How I got this crack to work was to install steam and register.  Navigate to your "C" drive find your "steam program" folder, open it, then u will see a folder called "steam apps" Then put the "black ops 2 folder" into the 'steam apps folder" and then run single player from there!  I dont even have to be running steam to start the game, but as long as the time zone is hong kong +8 and "black ops 2" is located in steam apps, it should work.  i didnt even have to turn a firewall on or do anything with my antivirus!  Thats just me so it cant hurt if u do!! Try all the suggestions that you have seen, but no one says to put it in the "steam apps folder and to run it from there!!  Good luck, that show i got it to work!

One last thing, the first time u run black ops 2 from the "steam apps" folder, it might take a good 2 or 3 minutes for the game to load, so if u get a black screen be patient, give it time it will load, after that initial 1st run, the game starts quickly!!  Again change the time zone to hong kong, try not changing the date at first, put game in the "steam apps" folder, run game from steam apps folder.  it should work.  if it doesn't maybe run steam offline, change date and run from steam apps!!  Experiment, but this was the only crack that worked 4 me!!  I hope u get it working my pirate bay friends!!!

Finally got this to work, windows 8 x64. Go to: C:Program Files (x86)ActivisionCall of Duty Black Ops IIredistDirectXDXSETUP.exe

Run and install. Set the date and time to the 14th Nov, +8 hong kong.

Run the game.

Alternatively use one of the new cracks that fix the date and time issue.

Game is working fine so far! No black screen or crashing.

IT DOES WORK

I tried all the others with no luck, but this one worked. Here's how I got it working for me.

1. Install the game from SKIDROW
2. Copy/Replace this crack in game directory
3. NVidia users update to latest BETA Driver
4. Run DXSETUP.exe, its located in Program Files (x86)Call of Duty Black Ops 2redistDirectX
5. Set the time +8 hours hong kong time
6. Set the date to 14th november 2012
7. Run the game as administrator

Played all the way through with no crashes, great game, will buy it in a few weeks when the servers aren't too overcrowded.
